actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to correct certain slope failures and erosion problems along the banks of the Coosa River.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to correct erosion problems along the banks of the Coosa River, Alabama, in order to protect the Fort Toulouse National Historic Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to correct certain slope failures and erosion problems along the banks of the Coosa River.
